        <script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {	
	var overlay = $('<div id="overlay" style="height: ' + $(document).height() + 'px; width: 100%; display: block;"> </div>');
	if($("#overlay").length == 0) {
		overlay.fadeIn(200,function() {$(this).css({opacity: 0.0, background: '#000'}).animate({opacity:.80})}).appendTo(document.body).bind('click',function(){
		});
	}
	// pop window close
	$("div.pop a.close").click(function () {
		$(this).parent("div").fadeOut(200);
		$("div#overlay").fadeOut(200,function() {
			$("#overlay").remove();
		});
		return false;
	});
	$("#overlay").click(function () {
		$("div.pop").fadeOut(200);
		$("div#overlay").fadeOut(200,function() {
			$("#overlay").remove();
		});
		return false;
	});
	
});
</script>

</header>            <section class="container">
            	<h2 class="title about" style="background: url(http://www.quadro.net/css/images/bg-0.jpg) left top no-repeat;">Page Not Found</h2><ul class="secondary_subnav"></ul><article class="content page_1 bg_41">
<span class="hanger_title"></span><h3>Page Not Found</h3>
<ul class="breadcrumbs"><li><a class="" href="http://www.quadro.net/">Home&gt;</a></li><li><a class="" href="http://www.quadro.net/page-not-found">Page Not Found&gt;</a></li></ul><section><p>	The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.</p><p>	Please try the following:</p><ul>	<li>		If you typed the page address in the Address bar, make sure that it is spelled correctly.</li>	<li>		Open the <a href="http://www.quadro.net/">http://www.quadro.net/</a> home page, and then look for links to the information you want.</li>	<li>		Click the Back button to try another link.</li></ul><br /><br /></section></article>   
                
            </section>
